ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: If you don t mind, where can one purchase a Dwarven axe and what are it s stats? Thanks, Kaladin, Dwarven Paladin ...
ygData.messageBody:
If you don't mind, where can one purchase a Dwarven axe and what are it's stats?

Thanks,
Kaladin, Dwarven Paladin

RangerDest@... wrote:

> As for weapons, I use one handed slashing. I know that a two hander
> is better for dmg but I figure the lower delay time (26 thanks to the dwarven
> axe) and bash dmg gets me almost equal to a 2H.
